name: Brighthouse Financial, Inc.
description: Brighthouse Financial, Inc. is a leading provider of annuities and life insurance products in the United States, dedicated to helping individuals achieve financial security. Founded in 2017 as a spin-off from MetLife, Brighthouse Financial focuses on offering innovative solutions that meet the diverse needs of its customers. The company specializes in fixed and variable annuities, life insurance policies, and other financial products that cater to retirement planning and wealth management. With a commitment to transparency and customer satisfaction, Brighthouse aims to empower consumers by providing them with the tools and support needed to navigate their financial futures. The company is headquartered in Charlotte, North Carolina, and operates through a network of independent financial professionals and distribution partners. Brighthouse Financial is known for its strong financial backing, robust product offerings, and a customer-centric approach that emphasizes tailored solutions for both individuals and businesses. The company is actively engaged in improving the financial literacy of its clients, ensuring that they have the knowledge and resources to make informed decisions about their financial goals.
